metadata.title: CVE-2021-39657 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In ufshcd_eh_device_reset_handler of ufshcd.c, there is a possible out ofbounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to localinformation disclosure with System execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-194696049References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
